summary:
JumpTask - Earn money as you play, solve, or share: all in one app

 Earn $100+ per month - Turn your scrolling time into earnings! On JumpTask, you pick a simple task, spend 3-5 minutes, and earn instantly. Make every minute count — today.

 Total paid out - $false

 Registered users - false

 Completed payouts - false

 Register - Use your crypto wallet or your social accounts

 Complete a task - Choose a task you like and start doing it

 Get paid - Get paid instantly once you complete the task

 Offers - Play simple games, watch videos and do other microtasks to get paid effortlessly.

 Bandwidth sharing - Share your available mobile data with verified businesses and individuals to earn money.

 Staking - Maximize JumpToken returns: transfer tokens to a staked pool which generates passive income.

 Surveys - Take surveys, help companies improve their operations and get paid in the process.

 Games - Play the latest games and get paid in $JMPT with each new milestone!
